max and min image shapes by area are: (1024, 2048), (1024, 2048)
max and min image shapes by height are: (1024, 2048), (1024, 2048)
max and min image shapes by width are: (1024, 2048), (1024, 2048)


we ignore label value of 255 in label images
label values are within range of [0, 33]
label values that are missing: []
